title: DRI initiates inquiry against Maruti Suzuki over incorrect HSN code of imported part
description: Maruti Suzuki India is under investigation by the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) for incorrect HSN code usage and incorrect payment of IGST on imported automobile parts. The company stated that it will respond appropriately to the inquiry and that it will not have a significant impact on its operations or finances.
